column6: Reporters Ben Urich and Sally Floyd are on the scene of the Hulk's war on Earth â€" but will they get caught in the crossfire? Also, detective Danny Granville and Hulk's warbound ally Korg expose the truth behind the death of ARCH-E-5912!
